programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: Jeepers Creepers: Directed by Victor Salva. With Gina Philips, Justin Long, Jonathan Breck, Patricia Belcher. A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0263488/","name":"Jeepers Creepers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNDU0NTE0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAzNzQyMTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0263488/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KaterinaNV"},"dateCreated":"2002-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining, but not all that","reviewBody":"I found parts of this movie, mainly the beginning to be very promising. I really thought that it was going to be an 'on the edge of your seat' horror film and the opening had all the tension and weirdness that one needs to set that kind of atmosphere. But as the movie progressed, even though it never sunk to being bad or even mediocre (no Friday the 13th B.S. here), I think it became a little bit of a disappointment because it didn't live up to the promise that it made in the beginning. And although I like to let my mind fill in the blanks, there was a lot that went unexplained that made it so that I wasn't really satisfied by the time it finished. I didn't recognize the names of the actors or the director, and they were neither here nor there for me - that's not to say that I thought the performances were bad, they definitely were fitting and on the mark for the genre. It's just that they didn't really stick out for me.\n\nAll of the above being said, if the movie was on cable on a cold winter night, I'd probably relent and watch it again - it's certainly better than most in it's category, but would I recommend it as a 'great' film? No, probably not.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":119428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2001-08-31","keywords":"demon,wings,record player,eaten alive,scarecrow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi10009113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmExZThlMDUtODMzNC00Mjc0LThhYWUtMTZkYTcxYzVjMDI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmExZThlMDUtODMzNC00Mjc0LThhYWUtMTZkYTcxYzVjMDI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005312/","name":"Gina Philips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0519043/","name":"Justin Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0106534/","name":"Jonathan Breck"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759207/","name":"Victor Salva"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092605/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759207/","name":"Victor Salva"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

I really thought that it was going to be an 'on the edge of your seat' horror film and the opening had all the tension and weirdness that one needs to set that kind of atmosphere. But as the movie progressed, even though it never sunk to being bad or even mediocre (no Friday the 13th B.S. here), I think it became a little bit of a disappointment because it didn't live up to the promise that it made in the beginning. programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Od sumraka do zore
programme.desc: From Dusk Till Dawn: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino, Harvey Keitel, Juliette Lewis. Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116367/","name":"From Dusk Till Dawn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk3YmZhMDAtOWUzMS00YjE5LTkxNzAtY2I1NGZjMDA2ZTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116367/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Son_of_Mansfield"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"If Seth Gecko had taken on those tomatoes, they never would have eaten France.","reviewBody":"George Clooney should have stuck will this kind of role. He did fine in Out of Sight and Ocean's Eleven, but he really dominated this movie with a fury that we may never see again. Almost every line he delivers is memorable and that is not all Tarantino's doing. The rest of the cast is dominated by cool cameos and veteran cult and mainstream names. The exception being Ernest Liu who does a good job of holding his own. No Tarantino film would be complete without a good soundtrack. This one, as with Desperado, features songs by Tito and Tarantula. Although I have only heard four songs by them, I consider them one of my favorites. I will never forget what my parents told me after they watched this without me. "You sure can pick 'em," my mother blurted with distain. Do not make my mistake, watch it with your parents to see them squirm.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":299216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"datePublished":"1996-01-19","keywords":"stripper,held hostage,u.s. mexico border,priest,strip club","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"From Dusk Till Dawn","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3052320281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZDY5ODAtZDg2Ny00ZDJlLTk2YzgtNmEzMjZiOWFkYmZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZDY5ODAtZDg2Ny00ZDJlLTk2YzgtNmEzMjZiOWFkYmZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for From Dusk Till Dawn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000496/","name":"Juliette Lewis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0870559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476071/","name":"Robert Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Age of the Dragons
Doba zmaja
programme.desc:
Age of the Dragons: Directed by Ryan Little. With Danny Glover, Vinnie Jones, Corey Sevier, Sofia Pernas. Herman Melville's classic novel Moby Dick, is recreated in a world where Captain Ahab and his crew search for a Great White Dragon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1594917/","name":"Age of the Dragons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ2MTg4NjA2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzY2NzcwOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Herman Melville's classic novel Moby Dick, is recreated in a world where Captain Ahab and his crew search for a Great White Dragon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1594917/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tim851"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a horrible, horrible movie","reviewBody":"I thought the basic idea to remake Moby Dick in a slightly steam-punk version with dragons was intriguing enough. Sure, this is probably not gonna be a film for the ages, but it could be entertaining for ninety minutes.

But it's just horrible. Oh so horrible. The acting is some of the worst I have ever seen, if I account for the fact that they did indeed use professional actors. Danny Glover and Vinnie Jones have never been praised for their craft when playing the shallow roles they've played before. Here now, they are cast in character roles and that is a disaster. Jones tries to summon some gravitas by constantly suckling on this wee pipe of his and it looked ridiculous. The other male actors are underwhelming at best. They seem to have been selected because they all resemble other (more talented) actors.

The female lead was clearly cast based on "Who was the hottest chick that showed up?" Her acting is the worst.

The screenplay is just clown shoes. But the real highlight of this thing is the "ship". It looks like a carrack without sails, but wheels instead. It moves forward by means of ... erm, nobody knows. At the very least, they should have lamp-shaded it. But no.

This thing is only a 2/10 because the dragon special effects are somewhat decent. Somewhat. Otherwise it would be a 1/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2013-12-04","keywords":"downward spiral,dragon,revenge,harpooner,sword and sorcery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Age Of The Dragons","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3116014873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMzY3MjMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU5NjQ2NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMzY3MjMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU5NjQ2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Age Of The Dragons"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000418/","name":"Danny Glover"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005068/","name":"Vinnie Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0786417/","name":"Corey Sevier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0514662/","name":"Ryan Little"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111135/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076345/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011582/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1384611/","name":"McKay Daines"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2249135/","name":"Gil Aglaure"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1237224/","name":"Anne K. Herman Melville's classic novel Moby Dick, is recreated in a world where Captain Ahab and his crew search for a Great White Dragon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1594917/","name":"Age of the Dragons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ2MTg4NjA2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzY2NzcwOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Herman Melville's classic novel Moby Dick, is recreated in a world where Captain Ahab and his crew search for a Great White Dragon.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1594917/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Tim851","dateCreated":"2011-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a horrible, horrible movie","reviewBody":"I thought the basic idea to remake Moby Dick in a slightly steam-punk version with dragons was intriguing enough. Sure, this is probably not gonna be a film for the ages, but it could be entertaining for ninety minutes.

But it's just horrible. Oh so horrible. The acting is some of the worst I have ever seen, if I account for the fact that they did indeed use professional actors. Danny Glover and Vinnie Jones have never been praised for their craft when playing the shallow roles they've played before. Here now, they are cast in character roles and that is a disaster. Jones tries to summon some gravitas by constantly suckling on this wee pipe of his and it looked ridiculous. The other male actors are underwhelming at best. They seem to have been selected because they all resemble other (more talented) actors.

The female lead was clearly cast based on "Who was the hottest chick that showed up?" Her acting is the worst.

The screenplay is just clown shoes. But the real highlight of this thing is the "ship". It looks like a carrack without sails, but wheels instead. It moves forward by means of ... erm, nobody knows. At the very least, they should have lamp-shaded it. But no.

This thing is only a 2/10 because the dragon special effects are somewhat decent. Somewhat. Otherwise it would be a 1/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2013-12-04","keywords":"downward spiral,dragon,revenge,harpooner,sword and sorcery","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Age Of The Dragons","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3116014873","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMzY3MjMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU5NjQ2NA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMzY3MjMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU5NjQ2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Age Of The Dragons","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000418/","name":"Danny Glover","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005068/","name":"Vinnie Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0786417/","name":"Corey Sevier"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0514662/","name":"Ryan Little"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111135/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076345/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011582/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1384611/","name":"McKay Daines","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2249135/","name":"Gil Aglaure","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1237224/","name":"Anne K. programme.desc: Treasure Island: Directed by Fraser C. Heston. With Charlton Heston, Christian Bale, Oliver Reed, Christopher Lee. The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate Captain Long John Silver." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100813/","name":"Treasure Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEzZmVhOGEtNTMxMy00YmE4LTk1YzQtMjcxMWI1ZDc2MWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate Captain Long John Silver.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100813/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hans101067"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rousing Adaptation Follows Novel Closely","reviewBody":"This version of Stevenson's masterpiece is probably the one that most closely follows the novel.It appears that they must have had a copy alongside when they were writing the script.Oh,we can certainly have criticisms,of inaccuracies,and diversions,but they're so small.Bale is some flat as Jim Hawkins,and he does appear a little dull-witted(which is NOT the same as being stupid)but what of it.He's the closest in age of any interpreter.I've heard people complain of Heston being cast against type as Silver,stating that he's not doing a hero.Nonsense!Silver happens to be an evil hero!Wood's Smollet is a little too young for the character,and Halsey and Coyle are both much too young for theirs(Hands and Morgan are described as rather elderly pirates)but what of it?They do a fine job.The fight at the stockade is much more elaborate than was described in the book,but can we have a Heston film that doesn't have an epic battle?Besides,it's so much fun.And Silver's escape is not as described in the novel,but it's so original,and so much in character,that we have to cheer the old blackguard in his resourcefulness.Get the video,stock up lots of beverages,make lots of popcorn,and settle back for a rousing,rollicking good time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5104,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"Not programme.title: xXx
xXx
programme.desc: xXx: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson. An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295701/","name":"xXx","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZjZmM1ZDctNDhlZi00Mzk1LWFjNWItYzIxNGY2OWYzYjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295701/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmuntmootcourt"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not exactly smart entertainment, but fun.","reviewBody":"Look, I'm not going to pretend that this is some sort of masterpiece. Though it is basically another "generic action flick", the twists that they add to it make it worth watching. The way they incorporate their "recruitment program" into the movie is fun and original, and though Vin Diesel doesn't really "act" in it, it's a lot of fun to watch. It has a few suspenseful plot elements, and the way they incorporate his status as an extreme sports star (not a spoiler, it's in the previews) into the way he conducts himself as a secret agent makes it more believable. Ever think about some of the stunts that go on in an action movie and wonder, "Okay, exactly WHY would this particular person know how to do that?", because it seems completely unlikely that there would be some sort of training program for the stunt they just pulled off? This movie doesn't have that, because whether he's on a motorcycle, skis, or whatever, you can believe that an extreme sports star would be able to pull off what he's doing. Though the plot is as unrealistic as most movies of this genre, the stunts are a lot more believable than you'll find in most.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176687,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-11","keywords":"time bomb,kidnapping,tattoo on torso,adventure hero,physical skill","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451084569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Serendipity
Igra sudbine
programme.desc:
Serendipity: Directed by Peter Chelsom. With John Cusack, Kate Beckinsale, Jeremy Piven, Bridget Moynahan. A couple search for each other years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0240890/","name":"Serendipity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWFhZTc4NDEtNDA0MS00NmFiLWFlNzUtMDM0NTExNjc3NzZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzI0NDc4ODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple search for each other years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0240890/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FlickJunkie-2"},"dateCreated":"2002-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enchanting romantic comedy","reviewBody":"This charming romantic comedy has all the right ingredients and serves up a bouillabaisse of schmaltzy romance and slapstick fun. Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Beckinsale) meet in Bloomingdales when they both want to purchase the same pair of gloves. The attraction is instant and they spend a romantic evening cavorting around New York City together. At the end of the evening John wants to see her again, but Sara decides that if it is fate that they should be together, they will find each other again. She drives away in a cab and he never sees her again. Well, almost never.

Years go by and both of them are about to be married, but each still has this nagging feeling that the other was his/her one true love. Of course fate conspires to bring them back together (after about a dozen near misses) as they each simultaneously undertake one last attempt to find one another just before they get married to someone else.

The fate angle is plowed mercilessly, almost to the point of nausea, but the skits are funny and the chemistry between Cusack and Beckinsale is enchanting. Cusack is an expert at playing the tortured and neurotic lover, but here he is more haunted and forlorn than dysfunctional, and it plays much better than his previous two characters in `High Fidelity' and `America's Sweethearts'. 

Kate Beckinsale rocketed from obscurity to prominence with her performance in `Pearl Harbor' and proves to be a wonderful romantic lead in this film. She is breezy and adorable and spins a delightful web around Jonathan and the viewer. The film also benefits from outstanding comedic support from Jeremy Piven as Jonathan's best friend and devoted Sara sleuth. Piven's zany comedy proves to be the perfect complement to Cusack's wry despondency. Eugene Levy is a scream as the eccentric Bloomingdales salesman, who blackmails Jonathan into buying half the store to give him information from Sara's charge account.

All in all, this is an entertaining comedy that is insubstantial but delectable. I tend to give romantic comedies a little more slack, because I'm a sucker for this slush, and this is one of the better ones I've seen in a while so I rated it a 9/10. This lighthearted romp makes a great date flick, but if serious drama is your preference stay away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108126,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-04-03","keywords":"fate,destiny,serendipity,christmas,coincidence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Serendipity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi735092249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NjEwNDYtZTM4ZS00OWRiLTlmZWMtYjljODgwOWQxNjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NjEwNDYtZTM4ZS00OWRiLTlmZWMtYjljODgwOWQxNjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #3"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005315/","name":"Jeremy Piven"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155093/","name":"Peter Chelsom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018522/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044742/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0458884/","name":"Marc Klein"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Years go by and both of them are about to be married, but each still has this nagging feeling that the other was his/her one true love. Of course fate conspires to bring them back together (after about a dozen near misses) as they each simultaneously undertake one last attempt to find one another just before they get married to someone else.

The fate angle is plowed mercilessly, almost to the point of nausea, but the skits are funny and the chemistry between Cusack and Beckinsale is enchanting. Cusack is an expert at playing the tortured and neurotic lover, but here he is more haunted and forlorn than dysfunctional, and it plays much better than his previous two characters in `High Fidelity' and `America's Sweethearts'. 

Kate Beckinsale rocketed from obscurity to prominence with her performance in `Pearl Harbor' and proves to be a wonderful romantic lead in this film. She is breezy and adorable and spins a delightful web around Jonathan and the viewer. The film also benefits from outstanding comedic support from Jeremy Piven as Jonathan's best friend and devoted Sara sleuth. Piven's zany comedy proves to be the perfect complement to Cusack's wry despondency. Eugene Levy is a scream as the eccentric Bloomingdales salesman, who blackmails Jonathan into buying half the store to give him information from Sara's charge account.

All in all, this is an entertaining comedy that is insubstantial but delectable. I tend to give romantic comedies a little more slack, because I'm a sucker for this slush, and this is one of the better ones I've seen in a while so I rated it a 9/10. This lighthearted romp makes a great date flick, but if serious drama is your preference stay away.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108126,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-04-03","keywords":"fate,destiny,serendipity,christmas,coincidence","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Serendipity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi735092249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NjEwNDYtZTM4ZS00OWRiLTlmZWMtYjljODgwOWQxNjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NjEwNDYtZTM4ZS00OWRiLTlmZWMtYjljODgwOWQxNjkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #3","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000131/","name":"John Cusack","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005315/","name":"Jeremy Piven"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155093/","name":"Peter Chelsom"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018522/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044742/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0458884/","name":"Marc Klein"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The New Guy
Nova faca
programme.desc: The New Guy: Directed by Ed Decter. With DJ Qualls, Eliza Dushku, Zooey Deschanel, Jerod Mixon. A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241760/","name":"The New Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg4MDljNzYtNjNmNC00OThkLWIzMGEtZDc2Y2Y4MWZkNTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241760/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sigmoid23"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not about the story. It's about the fun.","reviewBody":"A lot of people will say the plot of this movie was lame, predictable and dumb and yeah, they're right. But this kind of movie isn't about a brilliant plot. It's about interesting characters and silly gags and parodying those more serious types of movies. There are some funny lines, sight gags and slapstick, some cute girls, the bad guys get what's coming to them and the good guys win. Throw in some surprising celebrity cameos (some of which you might not catch until the credits roll) and a great soundtrack that mixes old and new songs and that's what I call entertainment.\n\nThe cast is noteworthy too. DJ Qualls, of course, Zooey Deschanel (the chick from Elf), Eddie Griffin, Lyle Lovett, Jerod Mixon, Parry Shen, Matt Gogin etc. did a fine job. If you can watch a movie without being hypercritical about how "bad" it is, then get this, sit back a have some laughs","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2002-05-10","keywords":"teenage boy,teenage girl,attempted escape,three word title,bass guitar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The New Guy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1978728729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2MTUyNGUtOTk2NS00OTRiLTk4MzctNzVjNzIxZGVlNWRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2MTUyNGUtOTk2NS00OTRiLTk4MzctNzVjNzIxZGVlNWRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702809/","name":"DJ Qualls"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005164/","name":"Lyle Lovett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244630/","name":"Eliza Dushku"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214036/","name":"Ed Decter"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024252/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447583/","name":"David Kendall"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Beowulf
Beowulf
programme.desc:
Beowulf: Directed by Graham Baker. With Christopher Lambert, Rhona Mitra, Oliver Cotton, Götz Otto. In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120604/","name":"Beowulf","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk0N2Q5ZDktNWMyZC00NGI1LThmMWEtNTE3YjM0Nzg5YzAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120604/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cagekicker"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shame on them!","reviewBody":"I've read a couple different versions of Beowulf (the lady at the used bookstore couldn't believe I was reading it because I wanted to as opposed to needing to for a class), and I love the story.

When I saw that there was going to be a sci fi version of the story, I had high hopes. I thought to myself, "Self, this could be very cool." Sadly, I was very disappointed when I rented the movie and sat down to watch it.

As the ending credits rolled by, my only comment was that all involved should commit a ritual suicide in order to atone for their sins. I'm not going to burden you with any further comment. Make your own decision as to whether or not you choose to watch this movie. I wash my hands, and take no responsibility for your actions.

Good day.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11652,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1999-04-01","keywords":"battle,knight,monster,warrior,sword and sorcery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Beowulf (1999)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi176006681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTZhYTg3YzktN2UyYi00N2U1LWJmMjctYmM5MDdjODNhNTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTZhYTg3YzktN2UyYi00N2U1LWJmMjctYmM5MDdjODNhNTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Beowulf"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593961/","name":"Rhona Mitra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0183122/","name":"Oliver Cotton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048491/","name":"Graham Baker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070928/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1511619/","name":"Anonymous"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494996/","name":"Mark Leahy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152572/","name":"David Chappe"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: House of Wax: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Elisha Cuthbert, Chad Michael Murray, Brian Van Holt, Paris Hilton. A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0397065/","name":"House of Wax","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA4Nzg1NjQ2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDYwNTgyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0397065/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jakewill78"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Slasher!","reviewBody":"I wasn't expecting to much of this movie when I went into the theater but I had been waiting for it for many years. To sum it up, it was pretty damn good! Chad Michael Murray was pretty good, I thought he was going to be another Chris Flynn from Wrong Turn but I was wrong. Elisha Cuthbert was also good but the best performance has to go to Brian Van Holt. He played the bad guy too well, I mean he was sick, sadistic, and very cruel. The back story between the brothers was good, plus I liked how no killings took place until about 40 minutes into the film. It gave you time to pick the character you wanted to see live and the one you wanted to see die. Jon Abrahams was pretty good as the goofy best bud of CMM. I liked how Chad kind of cried when he found him dead, it was better then just him being like, "Whatever, my buddy is dead, who cares". It showed how he really cared. So overall, this was a darn god slasher with some great effects. Bravo!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120011,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-05-25","keywords":"wax,brother sister relationship,group of friends,masked killer,beaten to death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"House of Wax","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3584491801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJjNGVlOTYtMTliZC00ZmQzLWE4MjUtOWZiNTAyZTYwNzc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJjNGVlOTYtMTliZC00ZmQzLWE4MjUtOWZiNTAyZTYwNzc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for House Of Wax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614877/","name":"Chad Michael Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0385296/","name":"Paris Hilton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193846/","name":"Elisha Cuthbert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0067676/","name":"Charles Belden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370937/","name":"Chad Hayes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370928/","name":"Carey W. programme.title: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
Greystoke: Legenda o Tarzanu
programme.desc: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes: Directed by Hugh Hudson. With Ralph Richardson, Ian Holm, James Fox, Christopher Lambert. A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087365/","name":"Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2NmYjZjOGItYTQ0ZC00YjcyLTk3MWUtYzdmZjY1MGNkMDViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pegasus7"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite surprisingly enjoyable","reviewBody":"Once you get past the first notion of the unlikeliness of the actual events in the story, you'll enjoy this film a lot more. I have seen this movie several times, and still enjoy it. Although i find Christopher Lambert a mediocre actor in most of his films, i feel that he shines here (a good idea to let him speak in his native French accent, cleverly written into the script by means of the Belgian explorer who finds him)instead of making him put on a bizarre accent, and it works well. Ian Holm and Ralph Richardson are fantastic and moving, but McDowell spoils it again and most of her scenes are irritating to watch. Some of this movie was actually quite upsetting (the taxidermy labs and the scene where the ape/father is shot) but very well done. The scenery is fantastic, and the musical score is brilliant and stirring. Great make-up effects for its day. This movie is well worth watching, give it a try, you might be pleasantly surprised!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19641,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1984-03-30","keywords":"year 1885,shipwreck,africa,ape,orphan","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1200997145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjg3NWI4MmUtY2UzOC00OWUxLTk5MTYtMzNkYzc2MGQyMzU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjg3NWI4MmUtY2UzOC00OWUxLTk5MTYtMzNkYzc2MGQyMzU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000510/","name":"Andie MacDowell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724732/","name":"Ralph Richardson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0399853/","name":"Hugh Hudson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128312/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123194/","name":"Edgar Rice Burroughs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001801/","name":"Robert Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0042472/","name":"Michael Austin"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Summer Catch
Vruće igre
programme.desc: Summer Catch: Directed by Michael Tollin. With Freddie Prinze Jr., Jessica Biel, Fred Ward, Matthew Lillard. A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0234829/","name":"Summer Catch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE0MDRjOTMtODM1Ni00ODdiLTgxN2QtZGZlMmEwNWFlMWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAxNjkxNjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0234829/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"camcurwood"},"dateCreated":"2002-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Could have been better than what it was","reviewBody":"As some users have commented, the crude jokes were a bit much, and indeed they were. They were quite out of place in the movie - it was almost like watching two different movies at once - not in a good way. There was quite a bit of needless dialogue and interaction, almost all of it dealing with the crudeness and offensive jokes mainly directed at women. \n\nThe other parts of the movie were not bad, and I wish there was more of them. The interaction with the father could have been expanded, as well as the brother. The scenes with Jessica were good, and the baseball scenes were ok, and quite well made. Unfortunately, the plot was a bit predictable, with my girlfriend shouting out what she thought would happen next, and she was always right. The crude parts and predictable plot drag the rest of the movie down. I debated whether to give it a 4 - thinking I slightly disliked it, or if I was neutral and would give it a 5. In the end, it had to be 4.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15698,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-08-24","keywords":"girl wears panties,chatham massachusetts,peroxide blonde,female removes her clothes,braless teen","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Summer Catch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1502347545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU2MzQxMzQtMmNjMS00YTdlLWFjM2UtZmUwMGIxNWZiOThkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU2MzQxMzQtMmNjMS00YTdlLWFjM2UtZmUwMGIxNWZiOThkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005327/","name":"Freddie Prinze Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911542/","name":"Fred Ward"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0866132/","name":"Michael Tollin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099647/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266468/","name":"Kevin Falls"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0309691/","name":"John Gatins"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Beowulf
Beowulf
programme.desc:
Beowulf: Directed by Graham Baker. With Christopher Lambert, Rhona Mitra, Oliver Cotton, Götz Otto. In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120604/","name":"Beowulf","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk0N2Q5ZDktNWMyZC00NGI1LThmMWEtNTE3YjM0Nzg5YzAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120604/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cagekicker"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shame on them!","reviewBody":"I've read a couple different versions of Beowulf (the lady at the used bookstore couldn't believe I was reading it because I wanted to as opposed to needing to for a class), and I love the story.

When I saw that there was going to be a sci fi version of the story, I had high hopes. I thought to myself, "Self, this could be very cool." Sadly, I was very disappointed when I rented the movie and sat down to watch it.

As the ending credits rolled by, my only comment was that all involved should commit a ritual suicide in order to atone for their sins. I'm not going to burden you with any further comment. Make your own decision as to whether or not you choose to watch this movie. I wash my hands, and take no responsibility for your actions.

Good day.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11652,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1999-04-01","keywords":"battle,knight,monster,warrior,sword and sorcery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Beowulf (1999)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi176006681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTZhYTg3YzktN2UyYi00N2U1LWJmMjctYmM5MDdjODNhNTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTZhYTg3YzktN2UyYi00N2U1LWJmMjctYmM5MDdjODNhNTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Beowulf"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593961/","name":"Rhona Mitra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0183122/","name":"Oliver Cotton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048491/","name":"Graham Baker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070928/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1511619/","name":"Anonymous"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494996/","name":"Mark Leahy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152572/","name":"David Chappe"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chocolat
Čokolada
programme.desc:
Chocolat: Directed by Lasse Hallström. With Alfred Molina, Carrie-Anne Moss, Aurelien Parent Koenig, Antonio Gil. A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241303/","name":"Chocolat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwMjMxZWQtMzQ3OS00YWNhLThkNDItYTk4NDdhZDE4ZTEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODU5MDg5OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241303/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Travis_Bickle01"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable comedy-drama directed by Lasse Hallström","reviewBody":"Beautiful movie from master-director Lasse Hallström (The Cider House Rules, The Shipping News, What's Eating Gilbert Grape) with wonderful performances by Juliette Binoche, Judi Dench, and Hallström's wife Lena Olin. "Chocolat" is a very beautiful and touching movie about a single mother with a daughter who decides to open a "chocolaterie" in a very conservative village during Lent. What follows almost looks like a fairytale: the characters, the story, the music, the whole idea of an old conservative French village 

I liked the movie a lot. It has everything: a laugh, a cry, a wonderful story and some amazing acting performances. Juliette Binoche is made to play this kind of caring and sensitive women. Although Johnny Depp had a very small part in this movie, he was excellent as always. I personally think that Judi Dench gave one of her best performances in "Chocolat", truly great acting! Maybe not Hallström's best; I liked "What's Eating Gilbert Grape" and "The Cider House Rules" more; but certainly worth watching.

8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":184330,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"chocolate,france,village,food,magical realism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chocolat","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2733547033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDRjNGI4MmYtY2U1ZS00N2UzLTk5MzgtMjIxYjlhMDI2NWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDRjNGI4MmYtY2U1ZS00N2UzLTk5MzgtMjIxYjlhMDI2NWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002120/","name":"Lasse Hallström"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104130/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364862/","name":"Joanne Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0414608/","name":"Robert Nelson Jacobs"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Evolution
Evolucija
programme.desc:
Evolution: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With David Duchovny, Julianne Moore, Orlando Jones, Seann William Scott. A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0251075/","name":"Evolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU3YjhjZmItNzBjNi00YWVjLWE0ZGQtNGY1NTFmMDczMzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0251075/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"keith.rogers"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Good, Original Feeling Film....","reviewBody":"The first thing to say is that this review is written by a non-American. This is to say that a different set of principals are brought to bear on the subject matter. I'm sure that other in the U.S and around the world will(and have)expressed opinions, but this one comes from "a whole other country". Evolution is a very enjoyable film. It has been made in a summer of super event movies, and film/game conversions and I feel stands alone as the only comedy with an original source material (in sci-fi anyway).

It is highly enjoyable. If you're paying 5 pounds (or $8.50) you need to find a film that refreshes your sentiments with regards to just what a big "money" film should be. As I sit here smoking a cigarette and drinking a 7up, I figure this film to be a winner. The principals act in a manner appropriate to the subject material, and although Mr. Duchovny is not a comedy actor, I feel he acquits himself admirably in an unfamiliar field. Mr. Jones is a relative newcomer to the cinema, and I reckon that over time he may very well ascend to the the same esteemed level as Eddie Murphy, or his latterday composite (of sorts) Will Smith.

The plot is most sound, and although it draws some comparisons to "Ghostbusters" as other critics have noted, it stands alone as Summer 2001's most original comedy event movie. Mr Reitman, a veteran knows how to make films play easily, is one of the few directors who knows how to use good comedy actors. With this in mind, no one is underused, perhaps with the one exception of Mr. Dan Aykroyd, nowadays underrated for some insane reason, but who is extremely talented. It's a shame that Aykroyd's presence as a "big" man is more valued then his acting talent, because he's always a delight to watch.

To cut in some sourness, there's not a lot of involvement with the central characters, and you do find yourself watching people being cheated into a state of reaction at the expense of the colourful effects, but that's the way it was made, and we can't change that.

In all I would recommend this film to the less morose viewer, as it's cheerful, colourful, and does not require an over-critical view. Watch it, and the hell with the printed criticism - you'll enjoy it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":125303,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-09-05","keywords":"shampoo,alien,chase,hero,helicopter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Evolution (2001)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2997027097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNmNDQ0ZWQtMWRjNy00NjRjLWJlNWMtOTUzZWYxYzdlZmY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNmNDQ0ZWQtMWRjNy00NjRjLWJlNWMtOTUzZWYxYzdlZmY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000141/","name":"David Duchovny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428963/","name":"Orlando Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118469/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0415979/","name":"Don Jakoby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224606/","name":"David Diamond"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919289/","name":"David Weissman"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: xXx: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson. An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295701/","name":"xXx","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZjZmM1ZDctNDhlZi00Mzk1LWFjNWItYzIxNGY2OWYzYjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295701/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmuntmootcourt"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not exactly smart entertainment, but fun.","reviewBody":"Look, I'm not going to pretend that this is some sort of masterpiece. Though it is basically another "generic action flick", the twists that they add to it make it worth watching. The way they incorporate their "recruitment program" into the movie is fun and original, and though Vin Diesel doesn't really "act" in it, it's a lot of fun to watch. It has a few suspenseful plot elements, and the way they incorporate his status as an extreme sports star (not a spoiler, it's in the previews) into the way he conducts himself as a secret agent makes it more believable. Ever think about some of the stunts that go on in an action movie and wonder, "Okay, exactly WHY would this particular person know how to do that?", because it seems completely unlikely that there would be some sort of training program for the stunt they just pulled off? This movie doesn't have that, because whether he's on a motorcycle, skis, or whatever, you can believe that an extreme sports star would be able to pull off what he's doing. Though the plot is as unrealistic as most movies of this genre, the stunts are a lot more believable than you'll find in most.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176687,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-11","keywords":"time bomb,kidnapping,tattoo on torso,adventure hero,physical skill","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451084569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Mega Python vs. Gatoroid: Directed by Mary Lambert. With Tiffany, Debbie Gibson, A Martinez, Kathryn Joosten. There's a crisis in the Florida Everglades as giant pythons are threatening the alligator population." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1680138/","name":"Mega Python vs. Gatoroid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwODY1ODQ3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTAyMjM5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"There's a crisis in the Florida Everglades as giant pythons are threatening the alligator population.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1680138/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bloodugly"},"dateCreated":"2011-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Its funny if you appreciate B-grade Sci-Fi hilariousness","reviewBody":"OK. Debbie Gibson. Tiffany. Mutant creatures. Cheese acting. Cat fight between Debbie and Tiffany. Total crap as far as "good" movie standards go. However, if you're into crap sci-fi movies, and you are old enough to remember these girls from the eighties and being superstars, its a great watch. Perfect for killing some time or putting on to doze off to if you have a TV by where you sleep and need something to watch and listen to while you drift off. I seriously don't know why some of these movie snobs bother to watch these movies just to criticize. I know what good movies are, and I like good movies. This isn't a good movie. Its a movie for people who like bad movies, or just bad movie trash to doze off to at 2AM. Its great as far as that goes and I hope they never stop pumping out cheap readily available movies like this for those of us that just need something kinda funny/amusing to kill some time with. Also, Jack Frost (the horror movie with a killer snowman) is great in that regard. There's a second one as well. Also, Santa's Slay...awesomeness!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3405,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-01-29","keywords":"busty woman,alligator,crocodile,psychotronic film,monster swarm","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mega Python Vs. programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Od sumraka do zore
programme.desc: From Dusk Till Dawn: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino, Harvey Keitel, Juliette Lewis. Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116367/","name":"From Dusk Till Dawn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk3YmZhMDAtOWUzMS00YjE5LTkxNzAtY2I1NGZjMDA2ZTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116367/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Son_of_Mansfield"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"If Seth Gecko had taken on those tomatoes, they never would have eaten France.","reviewBody":"George Clooney should have stuck will this kind of role. He did fine in Out of Sight and Ocean's Eleven, but he really dominated this movie with a fury that we may never see again. Almost every line he delivers is memorable and that is not all Tarantino's doing. The rest of the cast is dominated by cool cameos and veteran cult and mainstream names. The exception being Ernest Liu who does a good job of holding his own. No Tarantino film would be complete without a good soundtrack. This one, as with Desperado, features songs by Tito and Tarantula. Although I have only heard four songs by them, I consider them one of my favorites. I will never forget what my parents told me after they watched this without me. "You sure can pick 'em," my mother blurted with distain. Do not make my mistake, watch it with your parents to see them squirm.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":299216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"datePublished":"1996-01-19","keywords":"stripper,held hostage,u.s. mexico border,priest,strip club","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"From Dusk Till Dawn","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3052320281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZDY5ODAtZDg2Ny00ZDJlLTk2YzgtNmEzMjZiOWFkYmZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZDY5ODAtZDg2Ny00ZDJlLTk2YzgtNmEzMjZiOWFkYmZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for From Dusk Till Dawn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000496/","name":"Juliette Lewis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0870559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476071/","name":"Robert Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.Uz napete trenutke ove serije, saznajte ishod tajnih misija ovih hrabrih vojnika!

programme.title: Tuđinka
programme.desc: Serija priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Outlander je televizijska serija temeljena na istoimenoj povijesnoj seriji romana koju je napisala Diana Gabaldon, prateći priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Nakon završetka Drugog svjetskog rata Claire Randall konačno se ponovno sastaje sa suprugom Frankom.

programme.title: The Shield
programme.desc: Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom... Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom, specijalnom policijom koja se koristi nezakonitim metodama u borbi protiv kriminala, ali vrlo učinkovitim.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
Karate Kid
programme.desc:
The Karate Kid: Directed by John G. Avildsen. With Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue, Martin Kove. A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087538/","name":"The Karate Kid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzY2YzNmYtY2ViMS00MThiLWFlYTEtOWQ1OTBiOGEwMTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lging34"},"dateCreated":"2004-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Certainly one of the top movies of the '80s, if not all-time.","reviewBody":""The Karate Kid" is the tale of Daniel Laruso (Ralph Macchio), a young man who, on the heels of his mother's finding a new job, is uprooted from Newark, New Jersey, to the sunny shores of California. Daniel's mother has visions of a new start, a new life with the sky as the limit. Daniel, however, quickly finds that, for him, the West Coast holds nothing but hard times.

With the comforts of his rough, middle-class neighborhood thousands of miles away, Daniel tries to make friends and blend with the well-to-do, upper-class kids in his new home. At first, Daniel seems to do alright but, before long, he crosses paths with Johnny (William Zabka), the tough, rich leader of a group of karate students who attends Daniel's new school. To make matters worse, Johnny is the ex-boyfriend of Ali (Elisabeth Shue), a girl Daniel is pursuing.

Enter Miyagi (Noriyuki "Pat" Morita), an aging handy-man who works at Daniel's apartment building. Struggling for friends and failing to fit in, Daniel finds support in Miyagi. After enduring several beatings at the hands of Johnny and his gang, Daniel comes to learn that Miyagi, in fact, knows karate. Following a vain attempt to speak with Johnny's karate teacher (Martin Kove) about being left alone, Daniel is suddenly entered into the All-Valley Karate Tournament, where he will attempt to win the respect that Johnny and his gang have taken.

As he trains for the karate tournament with Miyagi, Daniel learns invaluable lessons about life and love. And brought to the foreground of this karate story is Daniel's pursuit of Ali, who truly is the single person who gave the new kid a chance.

On many levels, "The Karate Kid" is an uplifting movie. It illustrates how a lonely, out-of-place kid triumphs against the odds, and the movie doesn't need computer-animation or special effects to get its story across. But, for me and anyone who loves '80s movies, the "The Karate Kid" has to be appreciated for its nostalgia trip back to "better times." For that reason alone, this movie is a classic.

I've enjoyed few movies, if any, more than "The Karate Kid." I highly recommend this flick to anyone who loves a touching, uplifting story, or to anyone who simply can't get out of the '80s!!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":209048,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"1984-06-22","keywords":"karate,teenager,training,martial arts,bonsai","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Karate Kid","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi813087257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU0YTU1MTQtMjM5OC00Yzg1LWFmOWQtYjFkOTJkYWRiMTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU0YTU1MTQtMjM5OC00Yzg1LWFmOWQtYjFkOTJkYWRiMTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001494/","name":"Ralph Macchio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001552/","name":"Pat Morita"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000223/","name":"Elisabeth Shue"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000814/","name":"John G. Avildsen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042549/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024560/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436543/","name":"Robert Mark Kamen"}],"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Just Getting Started
Tek smo počeli
programme.desc: Just Getting Started: Directed by Ron Shelton. With Morgan Freeman, Tommy Lee Jones, Rene Russo, Joe Pantoliano. An ex-F.B.I. Agent (Tommy Lee Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program (Morgan Freeman) have to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5721088/","name":"Just Getting Started","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0NDdjNWEtMDVkMC00ODdiLTgyMmYtOWM0ZDRjOTU4MjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjM2MDMxMDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-F.B.I. Agent (Tommy Lee Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program (Morgan Freeman) have to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5721088/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"asche1959"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Haven't we all been here several times before?","reviewBody":"I know you know the drill by now, One nice. charismatic fellow is the "go to" guy at the old folks home. All the ladies want to date him and all the single guys want to be him. Life is good and going his way until a new comer comes out of nowhere to upset his happy little paradise and as a result he's yesterday's news. As a result the next 1hr & fifteen minutes are spent with our former #1 fellow trying in vain to prove he's still #1. Simply put, this movie isn't funny at all, nope not in the least. Oh it'll make you smile here and there but that's about it. The only thing this movie has going for it is star power but even then the lines are weak and non responsive at best. My friend and I didn't laugh at all during the movie. A couple sitting near us got up and walked out roughly halfway through. Another couple was heard saying "well that was a horrible movie" just as we walked by to leave. The more I thought about it no one else laughed at all during the entire movie either, not even once. Everything seemed so formulaic and exceedingly predictable and that's because it painfully is. Oh did I mention the once two adversaries eventually come to like one another towards the end of the film, yeah well they do, no surprise there. Morgan Freeman, Tommy Lee Jones and Renee Rouseau are all great actors and yet even they can't make this film funny. My guess is its the writing and script as it don't give them any room to work with. As far as I'm concerned this movie really should've had the direct to DVD release treatment, thus I'm only giving it 2 stars and I honestly feel I'm being far too kind in doing even that. Watch something else instead, you've been warned!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6883,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2017-12-08","keywords":"christmas,new jersey,snow,written by director,palm springs california","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Theaters Dec. 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4137990169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDcxMTY0YjYtMTM3ZS00YmNiLWIzYTEtYTEzOWY1NDBmODI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ0MDUyMzg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDcxMTY0YjYtMTM3ZS00YmNiLWIzYTEtYTEzOWY1NDBmODI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ0MDUyMzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A two-hander action comedy in the vein of Midnight Run about an ex-FBI agent (Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the witness protection program (Freeman) having to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000623/","name":"Rene Russo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005421/","name":"Ron Shelton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0515853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005421/","name":"Ron Shelton"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Agent (Tommy Lee Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program (Morgan Freeman) have to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5721088/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"asche1959","dateCreated":"2017-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Haven't we all been here several times before?","reviewBody":"I know you know the drill by now, One nice. charismatic fellow is the "go to" guy at the old folks home. All the ladies want to date him and all the single guys want to be him. Life is good and going his way until a new comer comes out of nowhere to upset his happy little paradise and as a result he's yesterday's news. As a result the next 1hr & fifteen minutes are spent with our former #1 fellow trying in vain to prove he's still #1. Simply put, this movie isn't funny at all, nope not in the least. Oh it'll make you smile here and there but that's about it. The only thing this movie has going for it is star power but even then the lines are weak and non responsive at best. My friend and I didn't laugh at all during the movie. A couple sitting near us got up and walked out roughly halfway through. Oh did I mention the once two adversaries eventually come to like one another towards the end of the film, yeah well they do, no surprise there. Morgan Freeman, Tommy Lee Jones and Renee Rouseau are all great actors and yet even they can't make this film funny. My guess is its the writing and script as it don't give them any room to work with. As far as I'm concerned this movie really should've had the direct to DVD release treatment, thus I'm only giving it 2 stars and I honestly feel I'm being far too kind in doing even that.
